text:
@parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Such a disgrace. Trump refuses to wear a face mask and applauds protestors ignoring social distancing, but today is “mad as hell” that he’s not being protected after his valet tests positive for #COVID19.

But ANYTHING for the campaign. Will you be supplying these to protestors?
